> January 25, 2025

## Put on your bandanas

NORMAL synergy has been reworked and now gives you a new exclusive item component: SILK_SCARF

## For a fistful of golden berries

GRASS now has its own weather and a new effect at Grass 9 which turn your berry trees golden

## A King on the chessboard

MIRACLE_SEED becomes the component for HP-based effects. GREEN_ORB and STAR_DUST recipes have switched, and KINGS_ROCK got reworked.
